name: Wrath of the Island Slime
description:
Soldiers came to your Island to find oil. But only oil they'll find will be their friends'.
Yummy soldiers, delicious...

Objective:
Eat as much as soldiers before you die. (Before your health reaches zero.)

Bars:
Hunger: Shows your hunger level. When it reaches to maximum, you'll start to die lose your health) slowly. If your hunger level is low, you'll start to regenerate your health.
Health: Shows your health.
Transformation Cooldown: Time you have to wait after you eat any soldier to shapeshift and become undetectable again.

How to play?
You can move the slime with WASD.  You can climb down or up the tree if you are directly on top or in front of the trunk. Holding down the spacebar will change your shape and soldiers won't be able to detect you due to your look. When you are close to any soldier, you can click on the left mouse button and eat the enemy. You won't be able to shapeshift for some time after you eat a soldier.

Made for Mini GameJam 50.
